riddles.Title: Puzzle Breaker
riddles.Riddle: I turn confusion into clarity, one question at a time. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Silence Keeper
riddles.Riddle: In a place where silence rules, I reign supreme. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Thought Provoker
riddles.Riddle: I spark ideas with just a few words. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Memory Lane
riddles.Riddle: I take you back with tales of old, where legends are told. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Grade Giver
riddles.Riddle: I determine fates with letters, not swords. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Idea Igniter
riddles.Riddle: I start with a spark and end with a flame of knowledge. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Number Ninja
riddles.Riddle: I slice through problems with precision and speed. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Secret Keeper
riddles.Riddle: I hold your secrets, but not for long. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Guardian of Growth
riddles.Riddle: I nurture young minds from seed to tree. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Deadline Driver
riddles.Riddle: I push you to finish before the bell rings. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Creative Spark
riddles.Riddle: I can make a masterpiece from just a spark. Who am I?

riddles.Title: The Quiet Observer
riddles.Riddle: I watch silently, ensuring rules are followed. Who am I?

riddles.Title: The Voice of Reason
riddles.Riddle: I calm the storm with a few wise words. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Vision Crafter
riddles.Riddle: I help you see what could be, with maps and plans aplenty. Who am I?

riddles.Title: Keeper of Time
riddles.Riddle: I mark the moments, never late, helping you navigate. Who am I?
